Review.Titre: UNLAWFUL DEDUCTION OF £8:49 FROM MY ACCOUNT FOR REORDER WITHOUT MY CONSENT
Review.Contenu: £8:49 was deducted from my account automatically when my previous order expired on 18/04/23. I'm not happy with this because I didn't request for reorder.

Review.Titre: I typed the wrong number on the account…
Review.Contenu: I typed the wrong number on the account and someone else is now enjoying the 30 gigs total of what I bought.  No correction was made even after sharing all the facts with them. No corrections made so my money is gone, not credited to my fiancés account and MY money was just wasted.

Transactions don't alwsys go through and it's very frustrating you don't offer a contact phone number. My first transaction didn't go through because I used wrong carrier. 2nd correct transaction didn't go through because 1st transaction didn't.  I cannot call you to explain because no number to call, and you will not call me. You used to have a number before. So how does one resolve such issues? Your customer service sucks for this reason!

Review.Titre: I will find it rather difficult to…
Review.Contenu: I will find it rather difficult to introduce this website to my enemy not to talk of my friends and family.I had been trading with you for over years or more but on many occasions when I mad a purchase the money will be deducted from my account and the beneficiary will not get the products o brought from you and these are very common when I am loading friends and family on GLOW NETWORKS.I had experience this time without numbers and the receipt one was just yesterday when I purchased air time on this Glow numbers 00234805506063. My account was debited but the beneficiary  couldn't be credited and the previous one just like that.All efforts to make complain are always proved abortive. Sikiru Odeyinka is angry from Dublin. Ireland

Your exchange rate from Dollar's 💸 💵 💲 to Naira   is very very low when someone buy $5 card is supposed given us N2,750, but ur own will given us N1,800And again the tax you do remove from smaller cards is too high, when someone buy $5 card the next thing you do is to add $1.60 as tax. I said I will never buy cards from  you anymore.  Boss revolution is the best card seller.
Calls break often times. Lost of credit all the time. Mobile recharge very expensive considering the fact that $1 =N500 naira

Hi!My name is Moses Ayeni. I do mistake to click accepted to be suceed after amont of payment of one thousand eight hunderd for the data and cant recieve the data on this number +2348132991089. Kindly help me out please.SincerlyMoses Ayeni

Review.Titre: A Very Greedy and Insensitive Enterprise
Review.Contenu: A greedy enterprise that very seldom offer its return customers discounts that could benefit their pocketbooks. It's only a matter of time before a more customer friendly competitor comes on the scene, takes your customers whom you don't value away and quicken your exit into the dustbin of self-inflicted extinction where you rightfully belong.

Review.Titre: I've used TelephoneNigeria for the past…
Review.Contenu: I've used TelephoneNigeria for the past 9 years. It used to be cheap.. but now it's quite expensive.

Review.Titre: Many times I lost my money for nothing
Review.Contenu: Many times I lost my money for nothing, becouse it failed. and I never got it back. If it works, then they charge a lot. I would never ever use this service if I not had to. But the only way to charge my friends phone from other country.

Review.Titre: All you do is deduct my money
Review.Contenu: All you do is deduct my money. I do not see the value you have added to me
Terrible. And stop taking my money without my permission

Review.Titre: You are not using the adequate currency…
Review.Contenu: You are not using the adequate currency exchange
Worst service ever. i wish you can refund me $30 i bought. i still have $21 left.
Wiping out the outstanding minutes balance at renewal is very discouraging

So I buy air time to call  my family back home in Nigeria but can't seem to get through most of the time and at times that I finally get through I experience call drops too often. Then there is the issue of my remaining airtime just suddenly disappearing. Every time I am forced to buy airtime from Telephone Nigeria is painful to me because I know I am not getting my money's worth.

I sent a mobile recharge to a Nigerian account, my account was debited of course, the recipient did not receive the credit - $25.00 worth. The money sounds small but it's so disgusting that after 2 days, no one has responded to my emails, there is no customer service phone number for me to call and I'm thinking - THIS IS THE LAST TIME I EVER TRANSACT WITH THIS COMPANY. It's just disgusting, rude, and u acceptable. Was supposed to be a surprise birthday gift for my sister.

The balance on my phone on 16 February 2015 was Naira 4282.  I topped up with £15 and the new balance appeared at Naira 7892.  The top up is in preparation of travelling to Nigeria on 20 February.  I have not used the phone.  I check the balance this morning (18 February 2015) and it is Naira 4587.  I have been ripped off Naira 3300!!

Review.Titre: I have a bad experience with Nigeria…
Review.Contenu: I have a bad experience with Nigeria telecommunications,I did a transfer to my son ,but there was a mistakes in the phone number number ,immediately I wrote to them but only to tell me that I cannot get a refund .it suck badlyMeaning you guys are not efficient and reliable.

Dear/Madam,Your service charge is now becoming too expensive. As a matter of fact, I’m planning to stop using your services. It dose not make sense anymore to use almost 4€ as a service fee to send €20 telephone top up to someone.Regards.

Review.Titre: Please you can make it better
Review.Contenu: I’m not satisfied with price. Earlier I use to have Double the minutes for the amount I pay but it was changed. Secondly, Everytime I call Nigeria, it does not show my number instead it’s showing different Nigeria numbers which makes the people I call most times don’t pick up the call because they don’t know who is calling. I live in Denmark but it’s either showing unknown number or some coded number. I want it to always show my Danish line.                                                               Thank you                                                                Emmanuel

Review.Titre: Do not use these guys for Glo network…
Review.Contenu: Do not use these guys for Glo network airtime recharge in Nigeria. The transaction does not get completed yet they insist that it is and then they refuse to refund the transaction. This has now happened to me twice. Bad customer service.

Review.Titre: Though i have kept my distance with …
Review.Contenu: Though i have kept my distance with telephone nigeria.com for a while, if u look into my past account  with u, I'm one of your good customer, i even introduced many customers to your company, but due to some circumstances, when buy credit to my son's number in Nigeria (+234 703 575 4962)  early this year,  which your company refused to send the credit of 5000 naira then to his phone or refund me up till date, you keep on telling me you have refunded which i didn't see up till today, this is so painful on my part, I keep on sending my account details, and you refused to refund me. So that's my reason i decided to keep my distance and considered to rate you so low.

i had the bad experience so far, I bought recharge card for my dad for his birthday and he didn't receive it. I was told they were going to open an investigation, i received an email the next day saying it had been process but my dad didn't receive the credit. I was told the problem was from Glo so I called Glo and they said they didn't receive any order from  telephone Nigeria. So am wondering if Glo didn't receive any order why did they send me an email saying that Glo has confirm the order and they have process it. Am so upset don't even know what to do right now and telephone Nigeria said they are going to open another investigation and they don't know how long that's going to take.

Review.Titre: Please I recharge wrong number since…
Review.Contenu: Please I recharge wrong number since yesterday I have been looking for away to cantact telephonenigeria to correct it all to know avail can somebody please help me out what to do,thank you
Poor services

Review.Contenu: Every time I have called the number 234-706-334-5637 I have gotten a message saying the line is busy, any time of the day or not. That is not possible...please help... Dennis Lockhart
It is really expensive. The percentage of charges on the call is pretty too much. So many friends and families have seek for alternative to call international. Review decision would be better.

Very expensive. Rounding up to a minute is a reap off. It's best to add up all seconds calls to minutes.

Hi, it's very uncustomer like, when changes are made without giving out notifications to services been provided, when changes are been made to the prices of call cards and number of minutes for each one, atleast you should have sent out a notification, instead of getting everyone confused. Thanks

We get the monthly plan and it’s set up for automatic which is great but you don’t get any of the points. We have been a loyal customer for years but we don’t get the points or rewards. Otherwise the site is good and prices are good.

Review.Titre: There should be a roll over even if the…
Review.Contenu: There should be a roll over even if the user do not recharge before the end of the plan expire.  Take all the minutes without roll over is stealing the right of the user

Review.Titre: Not satisfied with the fact that unused…
Review.Contenu: Not satisfied with the fact that unused balance are not rolled over.

Review.Titre: If I have another option I'll switch
Review.Contenu: If I have another option I'll switch. Too expensive & sometimes

Review.Titre: Telephone Nigeria currency exchange is…always on the low side!
Review.Contenu: Telephone Nigeria currency exchange is one of the lowest.

Review.Titre: you guys charge too much and from 47 …
Review.Contenu: you guys charge too much and from 47 minutes remaining I dropped to 22 minutes without a call. I wonder where those airtime disappeared to or who used it. plus the network just breaks abruptly to make one's call time finish quickly. Again, I did not order for a re-up. kindly, reverse it. I just want to finish my 46minutes and get out in one peace.

Review.Titre: I have been using this service and once…
Review.Contenu: I have been using this service and once gave it a 5 star review.  Bt more recently my experience with Telephone Nigeria has been dismal.  Every time i tried to recharge the number i regularly have been doing, i got a "pending" .... "taking longer than usual" error message and the recharges failed every time. I used the webmail contact to ask for help, got a prompt email reply to say my message was received, but really told me nothing,  Very disappointing.

When TelephoneNigeria first started, it was very good and I got quite a lot of friends to start using it. But now, just like everything that has Nigeria affiliated to it, it's gotten so unreasonably expensive I had to cancel my husband's service with TelephoneNigeria as he's in the habit of making calls without checking the cost first. I try as much as possible not to use telephone Nigeria unless I absolutely have to. Thanks to whatsapp.

For, Everytime you guys are giving out bonus credits for call cards, there's always a condition of having to buy a minimum of $20 what of credit that is attached to it before the bonus is been given, I think it's a very bad and it should be stopped,its not about the thank you points,its about the Conditions been attached to the bonus credit, Don't you think people have other options than you guys on call cards,so please if you want to do give it out,pls do without any conditions and if you don't want to,then let people people continue to buy what they want to

Review.Titre: Your  customer service is so very poor
Review.Contenu: Your  customer service is so very poor, not helpful  can't have no answers to your questions or problems bcos they don't wanna talk to nobody, if you call the customer service number the system answers and immediately hang up,  I you got lots of customers but as for me you got zero star and plus thumb down.

Review.Titre: You doubled your rate on us.
Review.Contenu: Since you doubled your rate on us, we doubled our lack of interest in buying from you. If you go back to status quo, we may decide to double our effort to buy more air time. Let's see who losses. Don't forget that there are alternatives relative to ways of communications. Thanks.
Very disappointing, why would it take endless hours for the top up to be made on the phone. Up till this time, the top up made for +2347063839990 has not reflected or made on the phone. Too bad.

Terrible rates, calling Nigeria for 9.9 cents per minute is ridiculous, this is up almost 70% from their previous rate plan less than 8 months ago. Clearly trying their best to extort innocent consumers!!
Call clarity have been poor. I also rated low because of the inability to rollover balance of monthly time. Should at least be able to roll balance over two months.

Review.Titre: You should email coupon codes to your…
Review.Contenu: You should email coupon codes to your customers that's why am giving you 2 stars for now and that might change when you decide to be generous to customers.

Review.Titre: Bad and unreliable voice calls..Am not…
Review.Contenu: Bad and unreliable voice calls..Am not enjoying it for international call to Nigeria at all. If it's not improved upon, I may likely cancel my subscription.

Review.Titre: The issue is that whenever I order for…
Review.Contenu: The issue is that whenever I order for airtime, I need to be stress myself to call before the status of my order will change, this piece me off sometimes

Review.Titre: When i tried to buy top-up online
Review.Contenu: When i tried to buy top-up online, there was no guidance on how to type my pin ,therefore i have n't used my pin since september 2019. Try and help.
The call quality is deplorable. I really don't know what happened to you guys. This was somewhat usable a few months ago.
I've been using telephonenigeria for years now found out recently I'd been paying too much all these times.

Review of telephoneniveria call/texting service. When using the app to send SMS texts, most never send, just deleted on from over a month ago yesterday that still said it was pending. Attempted to send text today, it is still saying pending, but I get charged for them just the same whether they send or not. Calls are a chance too....More times than not like this morning, it keeps telling me the line is busy and then hangs up. I see I got charged for a call at 3:56 am CDT, that I never was connected to anyone, it simply told me `the line is busy, goodbye' buf I got charged for it. Or the call cuts off in the middle of it and when I try to call back it says the phone is shutoff, when I know for a fact that their phone would not have been shutoff when we are trying to discuss something. I am in the process of trying to find a more reliable source for making my calls to Nigeria. For instance was asked to call my party back in a 1/2 hour and have not been able to get anything but a recording tellung me the line is busy, or goodbye. When I first started using the service it wasn't this bad, it seems to be getting worse instead of better as time goes on. Hopefully some changes will be made to improve this service so that the next time I can give a better review.

Review.Titre: Very low reliability and no customer…
Review.Contenu: Very low reliability and no customer service to reach out to in case you need help.

Review.Titre: It cut off and sometimes not hearing …
Review.Contenu: It cut off and sometimes not hearing from other side. I am not much satisfied
Fairly expensive compared to other online calling phone companies.
Had to stop using your service because it was too expensive

Review.Titre: ever time I'm on a call I'm always cut…
Review.Contenu: ever time I'm on a call I'm always cut off
Fast and efficient but the taxes are to much

Review.Titre: The web site needs to be updated
I didn't get the discount I was enticed about
Review.Contenu: I need the discount

The cheapest, cheapest clear network to communicate with families in Nigeria from Europe and UK. I've been using it for over five years now without issues. I have recommend it to friends both in Europe and United Kingdom.

I've always used your services and never had an issue, but the last few times I've made a transaction, I get a msg that states my order did not go thru, when it does. This msg has caused me to upload again, sending an extra transaction. Then the receiver states he got both credits.

My husband is in Nigeria.   When we talk it's usually a video chat. ..9 times out of 10 the network cuts us off.  ALL the money I have spent on supplying airtime is in vain.  The very least I should receive a credit for all these discrepancies from Airtel!  ..

Effective and reliable means of sending airtime to support our poor families in Africa. However, I will suggest a reduced percentage in the mobile recharge every month for appreciations and motivations, instead of voice credit. Thanks.

Review.Titre: The call is not strong enough because…
Review.Contenu: The call is not strong enough because any time regular calls coming it override the call.

Review.Titre: How to turn my points to credit calls

Review.Contenu: It'd be great to carry over any unused minutes to the following month
Sometimes takes time to connect. Need Call Clarity.

I had some mins left. My account was automatically recharged and all my mind then. I cried foul and one of your associates told me she was going to take care of me. Out of my over 30 mins(unconnected calls included), she only give me 4mins. That's very unfair. This is one of your very loyal customers.Do, give me back my unused mins. Tnx.Dr. Nmezi

For about 2 years now, since about the time that the minutes for calls were drastically reduced, the quality of your calls have declined. At times it is difficult to hear the person on the other side very well or the call just drops. The only reason I still use your service is because of the convenience of the keep calling apps' speed dial. Your rates are not as competitive as it once was, and the call quality has declined from what it used to be.

Review.Titre: You were doing well before you became…
Review.Contenu: You were doing well before you became greedy with some Nigerian officials. You subsequently doubled the prize of your service and your customers in turn subsequently found other means of communicating to their loved ones. Revert back to what you used to offering therefore and make more money as it's numbers game. Thanks.

whilst the service network is good, and customer service is readily available, I do feel that unused credit/air time from plan packages should be allowed to roll over into the next month as long as you credit your account be it voice credit or renewing plan. Currently the practice is that you can only carry over if plan is renewed by you and not done automatically even if you are on a renewal plan.This current practice should be reviewed.

Review.Titre: Lower price and improve on connection
Review.Contenu: I would have given five star but the product is now too expensive and playing up. I was part of the users that was paying £15 for 1000mins but had to now painfully pay £18.99 for 350mins It's a blow many of my friends returned to calling cards because the product is too expensive.Please reduce the price and lately PLEASE work on your connection to Nigeria because the line is often bad. This is a honest review from a very frequent user.

The rate is fair but my concern is the frequent drop calls. Sometimes you are unable to hear the person on the other side and they themselves unable to hear you. It makes it very frustrating. You make a call for 20 minutes but in actual fact you talked for 10 minutes. Please do sometime to make the calls clearer. On the other hand it is good for recharging your phone in Nigeria.Augustine

I am constantly infuriated by number of calls I receive from Nigeria (especially while am sleeping after a hard day's job) by people who shouldn't have gotten my number have Telephonenigeria has done the needful by making my caller hidden, or replaced by a number whenever I call someone not having my USA contact number in his contact list.

Review ur charges in view of the current rate of the dollar to the naira. Very important. Secondly I notice when u recharge on ur phone D amounts are not listed u have to input it.. Unlike on the computer. It's more expensive on the phone.. I have bin robbed twice now.. Good platform though.. So a three star

TelephoneNigeria.com was initially good but now cannot put a finger to know the type of service render to customer. Firstly, those number used to have access to international calls does not go through but yet credit are been taken away from you. Secondly, telephone lines been merge too often. Thirdly, even when one should referred customers to telephone Nigeria, most referrals do not get register as bonus. Fourthly, rate has increased tremendously; reasons best known to them or as compare to other service provider.

Your rate per calls is a little unreasonable when compared with other international phone companies out there, some of them I personally use on regular basis. So, why don't you have an executive meeting and come up with rates that your customers would drool on.  JudeFrequent Nigeria caller.

No options actually show you a simple amount every one of them are all odd numbers. Why not simply have a price of $11.00 to top up a Nigerian phone instead of $11.89 or whatever the case may be. Wanna break down what fees there are? Fine do that but have a nice round number

Instead of send Mtn card to this number, +2349033579179, I made mistake sent to this number +2349033579197, and I realized the number is unused, can u help me to transfer that #2000, to my wife account pls, is Mtn. Thanks, and u guy need have customer care to talk to.

An urgently needed policy shift: allow customers to carryover any unused minutes rather than your current non-customer friendly policy, and see an expansion of your market share assuming that you have a goal of growing your customer base.

I bought air time with my card. The money was taken from my account but I did not get the credit. I call the carrier in Nigerian, no solution. I was asked to contact Telephone via email. I did, no response till today. It's been abount 2 weeks now

Review.Titre: at first there never was any problems…
Review.Contenu: at first there never was any problems but then, this once i was unable to proceed to the payment. I tried and tried but it never worked.  I had to go into my emails and retrieve an email sent by telephone nigeria to complete the process.

Good. However, sometimes m number shows as the caller sometimes it doesn’t. Also, sometimes It’s difficult to make a call due to connection issues. Then, you charge taxes when one buys credit for a Nigerian phone number.

Review.Titre: It's too expensive and the connection is very poor
Review.Contenu: It's too expensive and the connection is very poor. I barely hear from the other ending because the it keep tracking and I am always cut off whenever I'm in the middle of conversation with my family. Please fix this. Thanks

Review.Titre: Good way to keep in touch
Review.Contenu: I really like the fact that I can call my sweetie without having to worry about charges on my phone. I was doing the monthly plan but they have changed it now and it is more expensive than when I first started.  Plus I don't always use all the minutes up every month and so it was a waste of money for me.  Sometimes the connection isn't so great but that may be the network I am calling to as well.  There have been times when our call has gotten cut off in the middle and I have to call back so that is not so good... but overall I like it.  The one thing I do love is I am able to add money to my sweeties phone and my phone at the same time.  Love that.

Review.Titre: I am a loyal customer.l l have been…
Review.Contenu: I am a loyal customer.l l have been with telephone Nigeria for some years now and l have never had reason to switch network since l joined them.Good service but more credit needs to be awarded to enjoy more minutes.
Honest  company, decent service. Their monthly package is a little expensive, when you don't use all your minutes it gets taken away. Wish they'll add a rollover option or offer coupon codes.
I like your product but I must say that it is too expensive. I can't understand why I am charged when I call, as well as when others call me. It doesn't make sense to me.
Good network service, great customer service and clear communication line but pricey rates. There are cheaper service providers out there. Do your research and price comparison.

Keepcalling app is good. Problems I have with it is it doesn't warn u beforehand when ur credit is low. It only says that like 4seconds to ur conversation cutting so u do the get a chance to warn who u r talking to. Aside this, it's very easy to top up or renew monthly. U can also top up nija cards from here which is good. Very clear and doesn't cut when talking. U can hide ur ID or make it seen when calling. App shows u minutes left. The app also has ur contacts so u dial directly from it. I am usually signed into the app so dial from there. It saves me having to type in access number and all that. With the app I call via Internet so whether free minutes or not, I call but with home broadband tho. If u use ur mobile broadband then u may be paying a lot on ur data.

Review.Titre: Some of the products that you offer or…
Review.Contenu: Some of the products that you offer or just not clear exactly what they do for the client  to me that's important because I want them to have the best ability of your services

Review.Titre: Great app but needs some updates.

Review.Contenu: Still not customer orientated. U shld treat your customers once in a while. Show them appreciation for being with u. 2ndly, let customers' minutes roll over to next month, stop confiscating it, it's their money, it's their time. Stop behaving so non chalantly and inconsiderately. Without the customers u won't be! U keep giving offers to new comers but how much have u given to the people that have been with U? 3rdly, develop your calling system. Technology has moved on. I want to be able to press # or * and move on to another call, not ending the current one and starting a new call again. Too outdated.2.3.20; Now in response to your reply, your keep calling app is crap. It doesn't hold a call. It keeps cutting calls so I don't use it. It's useless. That's why you guys need to develop the pin dialling one and cut the crap.

Review.Titre: Poor quality service since price hike
Review.Contenu: Apart from the increase in the cost of call, paying $31.99 for 300 minutes from paying $39.99 for 1000 minutes, the call quality has really degenerated. Dropped calls had increased, and the call clarity has suffered. To cap it all, maybe it is due to the system that is now being used by Telephone Nigeria, my caller ID does not show at the receiver's end unlike before, instead they reported seeing some Nigerian like number. The only reason I still use this service is because of the speed dial. I have over 90 names listed on speed dial which makes it easy to use, if not I would have dump this service for good long ago. I have not only being a user, but have introduced a few people to the service, if the service continues this way, I will have no choice than seek out alternative service even if not as easy to use as this.
I prefer TelephoneNigeria to other carriers. Your cost have gone up so much I had to go look elsewhere.You give no discounts even for a 1000 to 2000 minute a month customer

Review.Titre: Good but displaying unknown Nigerian numbers
Review.Contenu: Good but it's showing unknown Nigerian numbers to my recipient making them thinking I'm in Nigeria when I'm not. It will be grate if that can be corrected.

Review.Titre: Sometimes I find it difficult to…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes I find it difficult to recharge because I make use of my Nigerian card. But currently I'm not in Nigeria and it's impossible for me to get an OTP.
Easy to use. Could be better if one can call directly without calling a local access number. Compared to its competitors, less call minutes for same amount.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and good price but fuzzy line
Review.Contenu: Good price and always works; however, the line quality of voices coming from Nigeria to Canada is often fuzzy while the quality from Canada to Nigeria is clear.
calling to Nigeria is always questionable. Sometimes the call connects and sometimes not. calls dont stay connected long. Have to call back numerous times
Good rate to Nigeria.Good multiple automatic re-dialing.Needs to give user the ability to dial a new number much sooner than the system currently allows.

Review.Titre: The price or tariff is too high with communication errors
Review.Contenu: The price or tariff is too high, communication error sometimes, talking to someone and all of a sudden what have been said is repeating itself.

Review.Titre: It's a good cheap service but sometimes …
Review.Contenu: It's a good cheap service but sometimes my calls don't get through or get cut off. The voice quality isn't always the best.
I love this web site but the charges is too high, it would be nice if the charges can be reduce. fast service and accurate delivery though

Review.Titre: I need my number show will overseas

This service should be cheaper than it is now to Nigeria. The 350mins package should be like £15 now. Things have gone better in Nigeria since you last increased it💁‍♀️? 2ndly, when keepcalling tells u the person u r calling is not available, it's high time you guys built in a feature that will let people press #1 or #5 to follow on another call. Make it better! It doesn't have to remain the archaic way it is. Presently, you have to end the call and redial and start all over again. Come on people,  we r getting too digital a nation for this? Upgrade pls 🙄🙄. Make the calling experience more fun. When call cards are used to call, you can press like #5 to call another number without having to end the call. Besides, add more monthly packages and bring down the price. That's what we call looking after customers. You lot don't know how to look after customers. I've been with u guys for over 4yrs now or more, never received a dime, not a voucher, nothing. But look at "Just Eat", I joined them the other day and I've already received 2 discount vouchers! That's how to do it. That's how to encourage your customers to stay. Where u guys from again? 🤦‍♀️Reply to Telephonenigeria;Well thanks for getting back. I'm glad you guys are implementing no 2. It will make things a lot easier. And thanks for explaining the reason behind the price rates 👍. I still think that people like me shld be celebrated and rewarded. It ain't easy ya know. I buy that 350mins twice in a month! So discount vouchers is very recommended. People do it. You do give discounts or whatever to people who wanna top up credit for people in Nigeria, why can't you do the same for monthly package buyers like me here?? Treat everybody equally! And one important thing I forgot to mention in my review, when people have leftover of minutes from their monthly package, allow these minutes to be carried over to next month. Why are you guys so mean? We paid for these minutes so let us carry it over! Since you can't offer discounts, let this be the only thing we enjoy. The point I'm trying to make is that if you guysdon't do these things, new companies with better offers spring up everyday and the moment we discover them, we'll be gone. So if you're not doing anything to "retain" your customers, well, what can I say 🤷‍♀️? Good luck with it.

Review.Titre: Easy to buy and add to the phone.I have…
Review.Contenu: Easy to buy and add to the phone.I have been using it for years

Having used you services for many years, I will say that they were great.  I have rated your service four star performance because I would like you to review your timing software..  I noticed I was charged for calls that did not go through several times and the rounding up time to the minute is also not fair.I would suggest timing be rounded up to the next quatter of a minute as against the current minute.

Review.Titre: You would get 5 stars if you just…
Review.Contenu: You would get 5 stars if you just lowered your prices since Naira has dropped in value drastically and you still charge high rates.It is cheaper to recharge with my bank in Nigeria. Other than that, your service is excellent and fast!

Review.Titre: I like the fact that i can top up as…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact that i can top up as required and take as long as i like to use my credit. Connectivity good majority of the time. There could be an improvement on how to connect to the next call if line is not available or engaged.
You guys are deceptive. You pretend it's one amount but the amount changes at check out. Also the speed of consumption of minutes is questionable. Otherwise, your services are great.

Review.Titre: Generally I am happy with the services…
Review.Contenu: Generally I am happy with the services and have gone my way to recommend friends to join Telephone Nigeria.However, considering the modern society we leave in, I am suggesting that the service should be upgraded intermittently to align with the current society. I am suggesting on automated renewing with saved details and instant display of remaining creditsKind regardsMalvin

I had a great experience. Although they say money back guarantee that is not true. I had a number mixed up and purchase data. Called them when I saw the mistake and the money was not refunded. Because they said it went on an active number. But I talked with the carrier that told the number was inactive. But other than that everything was good

I’ve been using TelephoneNigeria for over 5 years now. It’s a great and user friendly site to use, the only thing is they should improve the recharge page more where I don’t always have to click on the provider and then enter the number. Instead, by entering the number, the provider should be detected and chosen for me and all I have to do is to choose either voice credit or data plan. But overall, great website. I’m impressed.

Review.Titre: Would've been an easy 5 stars if only…
Review.Contenu: Would've been an easy 5 stars if only you went by one name. I wanted to download the app to make my (satisfactory) user experience even easier but the link on the TN website took me through to an app with a different name (KC). A rookie mistake to make in business as it looks shady and doesn't inspire trust. Branding is rule #1 and in this case, I'm sorry but it's cost you 1 star.

Review.Titre: Decent price but wrong caller's ID
Review.Contenu: Pros - Decent price (but not as good as it used to be)CONS - Caller's number (my own number) doesn't not show on receiver's phone. It shows some strange numbersMinute rounding is not good. Improvement-Fix the caller's ID issue and enable receiver see caller's real number Stop minute rounding. UPDATE: Great. Caller's ID present once set. Thank you for the response telephonenigeria. Thank you

Review.Titre: I like working with this company
Review.Contenu: I like working with this company. You get a lot of bang for your buck. Also, they don't nickel and dime you. When you call and don't get through, you're not charged.  Customer service is polite, professional and willing to help. Also the connection is clear. They didn't get a 5 bc the app can be glitchy, doesn't let you add more to your account and doesn't let you know how much time left.

Telephone Nigeria makes my communications very smooth and enjoyable. I rarely experience call cutoffs or interuptions between conversations.However, their rate went up making it hard and costly for me frequent user. I wish they would come down on their charges or have cheaper rates, then I will not try any other Int'l phone services because Telephone Nigeria is my best.

I have been with you guys for over 5years now,and it's been awesome. Please upgrade your connectivity problems. A situation whereby I make a call to Nigeria and a Portuguese is answering my call plus the fact that my credit was been used since whoever picked the call did. Please get it fixed? Other than that you guys are great.

I do like the fact that you can actually pick up the phone and speak to a person. Most of the customer advisers I have spoken to are reasonable and have managed to deal with my queries, however there are other customer advisers who still require more training.  Overall, I think the concept is good but may need to allow customers to roll over credit into the next month without having to spend the full value of a new plan.

Review.Titre: I give this 4 stars instead of 5 bc the …
Review.Contenu: I give this 4 stars instead of 5 bc the app can get glitchy and if you dial by phone, with the pin # and the number, it's sooooo much to dial. Overall, it's the best top up company I've used so far. I don't feel like I'm being robbed and the customer service experience is professional and accommodating.

Clear network and good service. I have been using it for 5 years now. it's  convenient to make calls  and quite clear. However it's more expensive than before. The price of calls per minutes need to go down. This network use to display my phone number before, suddenly my phone number is been transcribed to different number entirely. I had to keep explaining, it's me, don't you have my number? They will tell me, my number it's showing Nigeria line or Ghana line. so annoying.

Review.Titre: I have tried other carriers to Nigeria
Review.Contenu: I have tried other carriers to Nigeria. There is none like yours. That is the reason behind my staying put with your company aside the cost of doing business with you. I have always preferred quality to cost. I am pleased with your services. When you misstep, be rest assured that I shall tell you.Thanks.Dr. Nmezi

Thanks alot, the service is great and very convenient, I really like.But my opinion to you guys is to look for ways by wish this same services can be use to call other countries in the world, there are so many families and friends in other places as well.

TelephoneNigeria is one of those carriers that have clear connections and hardly any drop calls. I like TelephoneNigeria a lot. It used to be very affordable but now it is so expensive. Before I used to tell people in Nigeria to drop their calls for me to call them back but no more. It costs approximately N41/min to call Nigeria from the US now, as opposed to N15/min to call the US from Nigeria. Some carriers give 3.4c/min but with very static and unclear connections. I have decided to drastically cut down on my calls to Nigeria.

Review.Titre: I think making a payment is simple
Review.Contenu: I think making a payment is simple. All questions get answered. I have one small issue and that is the.connection comes off sometimes and.hangs up and we have to redial...like it freezes up. But it is a good service and I would recommended it to others.

Review.Titre: Expected the rate to come done since…
Review.Contenu: Expected the rate to come done since the last time it went up but till now still what it is.I just logged in to  convert the 2770 point you mentioned in your reply. But it only shows 1500 points. Can you please correct that for me and notify me thereafter.Thanks

Review.Titre: So far it has been ok using keep…
Review.Contenu: So far it has been ok using keep calling. I gave it four stars because sometimes there is difficulty in connection and repetition of almost what has been previously discussed (echoing back). One has to end the call and start afresh. Overall, not a bad experience.

TelephoneNigeria is doing a brilliant job but should do better to do away with the administrative charges as customer already paying much.Rather should pass on any extra charges to the network provider for helping them markeet their products.Ken Elom ,  United Kingdom

Review.Titre: A cheaper option of calling home.
Review.Contenu: I've found Telephone Nigeria as a cheaper option of calling Nigeria. Making payment is also easy and prompt!However they need to improve on the quality of their service; as the line sometimes freaks out or the voices become distant,broken and unclear during calls.

I have no reservation in recommending this service to people that make international calls. What is Good about the service:1. Clarity of calls and ease of connection2. Good tool to recharge mobile phones abroad3. No hidden fees and minimal rate of minute recharge, the list is endless.I am happy maintaining my account with this service as long as they keep providing the same standard of service.  Overall, Telephone Nigeria comes handy when there is need to make international calls and Recharge Mobile phones abroad. I'm proud of this service. Keep up the good work.

Its really nice and okay, especially now the make it more lower price.....believe me it really helping me to call my people in nigeria, but sometimes the calls shake but I think its network.....and please stop taken much from mobile data when calling....thanks

Review.Titre: Good customer service and connection quality is faultless
Review.Contenu: Prices have gone up considerably. And you get charged from the moment you dial, when it is still ringing. However it is a pristine line...no interferences. And should you have an enquiry, the customer service is v.good.

Review.Titre: So far, your service is very satisfying to me.
Review.Contenu: I suggest that you ask recipients TO CHECK THEIR ACCOUNTS UPON RECEIPT OF CREDIT ALERT. Some recipients get confused with your message and think that the figures appearing therein should be keyed into their phones before utilizing the credit.

I've really enjoyed using TelephoneNigeria to make calls for the past few years.  Calls are easy to connect and clear.  The only thing I don't like is the ability not to carry-over minutes to next month.

Many times I would call without getting through. Also people from Nigeria will call me without getting through to me and still ttheir account will be debit. Also in the midle of the call the call will dropped.  Abayomi  Adedokun.

Review.Titre: Reliable service. I've told friends and family about it.
Review.Contenu: I have been using this service for years, and am pleased with it. I use it for calling and texting. It is the lowest rate I've found for calling/texting within Canada, to Nigeria and a country in Asia where a friend lives.

Review.Contenu: Been using it for years and its great. When ever I had issues they are quick to respond, good customer service. It would be nice if I could see the speed dial numbers without getting into my contact though
